locale.message: Define colors for each peer review state shown in article lists, peer review ask column.
Review ask colors plugin settings saved

Dates marked in blue represent reviews that have been concluded.
Dates marked in green represent reviews in process that are within the designated deadline.
Dates marked in red represent reviews in process that are not within the designated deadline.
Dates striked-through represent regrets or cancels.
